parameters.name: DbName
parameters.description: The name of the database that is scaled out.

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

parameters.name: ExpandType
parameters.description:
The scale-out type. Valid values:

*   smooth_expand: smooth scale-out
*   hot_expand: hot-spot scale-out

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The job ID of the scale-out task. The value of this parameter is the same as that of the ParentJobId parameter.

parameters.name: ParentJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the scale-out task. This parameter is returned if you send a request for the smooth scale-out task.
